tech_news.title: New Year’s Sale 2025 - Minecraft
tech_news.description: 2025 is coming to an end, and what better way to commemorate this year than with a massive sale!

tech_news.title: Own a First-Gen Starlink Router? SpaceX Wants to Replace It for Free - PCMag
tech_news.description: SpaceX plans to stop providing updates for its 'Gen 1' router in the near future.

tech_news.title: Fallout 5 Will Exist in a World Where 'The Stories and Events of the Show Happened or Are Happening,' Todd Howard Confirms - IGN
tech_news.description: Fallout 5 will indeed take into account the canon events of the Fallout TV series, Bethesda development chief Todd Howard has confirmed.

tech_news.title: Mercedes-Benz discontinues feature that syncs music to driving - The Verge
tech_news.description: Mercedes-Benz is shutting down its MBUX Sound Drive feature that synced driving actions to musical tracks.

tech_news.title: This iPhone case with a second screen lets you snap selfies with its rear cameras - The Verge
tech_news.description: Dockcase’s new Selfix iPhone case features an extra smaller screen on the back for framing and snapping selfies using the better rear cameras.

tech_news.title: Google releases Find Hub app for Wear OS - 9to5Google
tech_news.description: As previously spotted in a promo video for the Pixel Watch 3, Google has released a Find Hub app for Wear OS.

tech_news.title: Receive Play! Pokémon Prize Pack Series Eight at Play! Pokémon Stores - Pokemon.com

tech_news.title: Google launches Gemini 3 Flash, makes it the default model in the Gemini app - TechCrunch

tech_news.description: Everything from powerful brakes to good books (and more).

tech_news.title: Google’s vibe-coding tool Opal comes to Gemini - TechCrunch
tech_news.description: The company on Wednesday said it is integrating the tool, which lets you build AI-powered mini apps, inside the Gemini web app, allowing users to create their own custom apps.
